item.description: Explaining 9 types of API testing. ğŸ”¹ Smoke Testing This is done after API development is complete. Simply validate if the APIs are working and nothing breaks. ğŸ”¹ Functional Testing This creates a test plan based on the functional requirements and compares the results with the expected results. ğŸ”¹ Integration Testing This test combines several API calls to perform end-to-end tests. The intra-service communications and data transmissions are tested.
